RTCRtpTransceiverDirection.summary:
The property
direction is a string which indicates the transceiver's
preferred directionality.

remarks.para: Its value must be one of the strings defined in the table below.

The transceiver's current direction is indicated by the
property.

RTCRtpTransceiverDirection.value: A string whose value is one of the strings which are a member of the following values, indicating the transceiver's preferred direction.
